import_instructions.description: Sample course import file for Nigerian E-Learning Platform
instructions: 1. Each course must have a unique title
2. Prices should be in Nigerian Naira (numeric values only)
3. Lesson order determines the sequence in which content is displayed
4. Quiz questions must have exactly 4 options (A, B, C, D)
6. For PDF content, upload files separately and reference them
7. Video URLs should be valid YouTube, Vimeo, or direct video links
8. All duration values are in minutes
10. Set 'replace_existing' to true to update existing courses with same title
tips: Start with a small test import to verify the format
Back up your existing data before importing
Use the export feature to see the exact format
Ensure all referenced files are uploaded to the server
